message: Let's get this started! I'm willing to give you a generous 10% to get the negotiations rolling.
I'm not a charity, I want a bigger share. Will you meet me in the middle?
Not quite, I'm not willing to give up 2/3 of the money. I'll meet you halfway, but I'll need to take more than 1/3.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need a bit more. This is a fair split, don't you think?
You're getting a bit too greedy, Alice. I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of.
Alright, I think this is a fair deal. I'm willing to accept 300,000. Let's shake on it!
